items.summary: Add a manager/admin-only backend query that returns a complete operator activity list (not just inactive operators) so managers can review overall operator usage in one place. The returned data must include each operator principal, their lastActivity timestamp, and (when available) the operator's saved profile name/role from userProfiles.

Create a new manager page that provides a simple, single-screen overview of operator activity, including a sortable table of operators with last activity time and a derived 'days inactive' value, plus an inactivity threshold control that highlights operators as Active vs Inactive.
Add navigation and routing for the new manager operator-activity overview page so managers can access it from the header manager section.
